mapper.insert: insert into sys_video (video_url, origin, agreement, band_width, station_number) values (#{videoUrl}, #{origin}, #{agreement}, #{bandWidth}, #{stationNumber})
mapper.update: update sys_video set status = 1 where video_id = #{videoId};
mapper.select:
select * from sys_video
video_url like concat('%', #{videoUrl}, '%')
and station_number like concat('%', #{stationNumber}, '%')
